Quick Start¶

Command line:

pip install konichiwa

Import:

from konichiwa import HelloWorld

Basic usage:

>>> hello = HelloWorld()
>>> hello.greet()
'Hello World!'

We can also use various options to format our greeting:

>>> bonjour = HelloWorld(greeting='Bonjour', punctuation='.')
>>> bonjour.greet("le Monde")
'Bonjour le Monde.'
